ABOUT

My name is Win Aung. I'm from Thailand refugee camp. I considered myself as a self-taught developer. I've worked on many projects to expand my skills as a front-end developer. I worked on Netflix, Spotify, Instagram and many other ones.

One of my favorite things to do is play soccer during my free time. I like to stay healthy. My dream is to be in states where I can always play soccer. California, and Florida are the two states that I wish to live in because of the weather conditions, the tropical cool breeze at night. it is so much like home.
